summary: Although loudmouthed braggart Jerry Plunkett alienates his comrades and officers, Father Duffy, the regimental chaplain, has faith that he'll prove himself in the end.
cast: James Cagney|Pat O'Brien|George Brent|Jeffrey Lynn|Alan Hale|Frank McHugh|Dennis Morgan|Dick Foran|William Lundigan|Guinn 'Big Boy' Williams|Henry O'Neill|John Litel|Sammy Cohen|Harvey Stephens|William Hopper|Tom Dugan|Frank Wilcox|Herbert Anderson|John Arledge|Trevor Bardette|Jack Boyle|Richard Clayton|Frank Coghlan Jr.|Tom Coleman|James Conaty|Joseph Crehan|John Daheim|Eddie Dew|Ralph Dunn|Edgar Edwards|Frank Faylen|James Flavin|Jerry Fletcher|Arno Frey|Edmund Glover|Chuck Hamilton|John Harron|J. Anthony Hughes|Layne Ireland|Donald Kerr|George Kilgen|Jacques Lory|Wilfred Lucas|Frank Mayo|Frank Melton|Elmo Murray|Byron Nelson|George O'Hanlon|Jack Perrin|George Reeves|John Ridgely|Frank Sully|Roland Varno|Emmett Vogan
title: The Fighting 69th
